OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
For the reasons set forth in Commonwealth v. Harper, 512 Pa. 155, 516 A.2d 819 (1986), filed contemporaneously with this decision, the order of Superior Court, 335 Pa.Superior Ct. 323, 484 A.2d 155, is reversed and judgment of sentence reinstated.
PAPADAKOS, J., files a concurring opinion in which LARSEN, J., joins.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision in this case.
